name: nullpointerexception-monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"

description: Full-stack application with backend and frontend
